Ball - Class in model
The Ball shape object that moves inside given region, itself defined by update strategy, paint strategy and canvas region.

Constructor of Ball
BallCmdDispatcher<TDispMsg> - Class in util
A CopyOnWriteArraySet-based IDispatcher that dispatches to its IObservers in parallel
BallCmdDispatcher() - Constructor for class util.BallCmdDispatcher

The ball model class.

BallPaintStrategy - Class in paintstrategy

BlackholeStrategy - Class in updatestrategy
The black hole that absorbs anything close to itself.

bounce() - Method in class model.Ball
Helper function to update the ball's velocity when a boundary is hit.
